description:
'Pretty' is an app for the members of the Shacknews Latest Chatty discussion board. Shacknews.com is a great place for video game news and discussion... but it also hosts a vibrant community that discuss everything from PC & console game strategy to other topics including politics, programming, and even tipping etiquette.

A free Shacknews.com account is required to use this app.

* NEW in this version: Support for profiles! Thanks to daVinci1980 for setting up http://chattyprofil.es!

If you'd like to show your appreciation for this free app, please use the Donate button in the About screen. Thank you!
